note.title: Discussion Venues
note.t: Discussion of this document takes place on the NETMOD Working Group mailing list (netmod@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/netmod/.
Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/henkbirkholz/draft-wwx-netmod-event-yang.
